articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Bulgaria
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Bulgaria 
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Feb. 25 sent a message of greetings to Georgi Parvanov, president of Bulgaria, on the occasion of its national day.
					Kim in the message wished the President success in his work for the economical stability and development of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Bulgarian PM and FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Bulgarian PM and FM
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim on Feb. 25 sent a message of greetings to Bulgarian Prime Minister Boyko Borisov on the occasion of its national day. 
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would further develop as required by the new century. 
					
					 DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a similar message to his Bulgarian counterpart Nickolay Mladenov on the same day.

articles.title: DPRK's Will to Strive for Nuclear-free World Declared
articles.content:
DPRK's Will to Strive for Nuclear-free World Declared
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The DPRK will as ever make every possible effort to realize the nuclear disarmament and build a nuclear-free world with high sense of responsibility.
					 A DPRK delegate declared this stand at the plenary session of the Geneva Disarmament Conference on Feb. 24.
					
					 Mankind is now faced with an urgent task to prevent the nuclear arms race, step up the nuclear disarmament and realize the denuclearization of the world, he said, adding:
					
					 It is necessary for the international community to take measures to finally remove all the factors that may cause nuclear disasters.
					
					 The nuclear disarmament is a pressing issue directly related to the existence of humankind rather than an issue related to global peace and security.
					
					 The DPRK has consistently called for overall and complete removal of nuclear weapons from the earth.
					
					 It is urgent for the nuclear states to set it a goal to dismantle all nuclear weapons and, for the present, stop the improvement and development of nukes and work out a comprehensive plan for reducing nukes and means of their delivery.
					
					 The nuclear states committed themselves to dismantlement of their nukes for the first time with the 2000 NPT Review Conference as a momentum. However, any substantial step has not yet been taken and the present institutional device is not enough to ensure the genuine nuclear disarmament.
					
					 Hence, it is urgently needed to conduct bilateral and multilateral negotiations for nuclear disarmament simultaneously.
					
					 The nuclear states should unconditionally pledge themselves not to be the first in using nukes and promptly come out to the negotiations for drafting an international convention in this regard.

articles.title: Lunar New Year Film Show for Sino-DPRK Friendship Arranged
articles.content:
Lunar New Year Film Show for Sino-DPRK Friendship Arranged
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The Chinese embassy here gave a lunar New Year film show for Sino-DPRK friendship at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on Wednesday.
					 Present there on invitation were officials in the fields of education, culture and the arts, media, etc.
					
					 Staff members of the Chinese embassy were on hand.
					
					 The participants watched Chinese feature film "A Flower in the Plain".

articles.title: German Guests Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
German Guests Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Jurgen Klimke, member of the Federal Parliament from the Christian Democratic Union of Germany, and his party visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace on Wednesday to pay homage to President Kim Il Sung.
					 They bowed to the President in humble reverence for him.
					
					 Jurgen Klimke made an entry in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Russian Orchestra Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Russian Orchestra Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung 
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The "Orchestra of the 21st Century" of Russia led by Head and Chief Conductor Pavel Borisovich Ovsyannikov visited the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill on Wednesday to pay tribute to him. 
					 The guests laid bunches of flowers before the statue and made bows in profound reverence for the President who made undying contribution to developing the DPRK-Russia friendship.

articles.title: Gift from Russian Orchestra
articles.content:
Gift from Russian Orchestra
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from the "Orchestra of the 21st Century" of Russia on a visit to the DPRK.
					 It was conveyed to an official concerned Wednesday by Head and Chief Conductor of the orchestra Pavel Borisovich Ovsyannikov.

articles.title: Russian Orchestra Here
articles.content:
Russian Orchestra Here
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The "Orchestra of the 21st Century" of Russia led by Head and Chief Conductor Pavel Borisovich Ovsyannikov arrived here on Wednesday.

articles.title: Anti-Japanese Joint Statement Issued
articles.content:
Anti-Japanese Joint Statement Issued
						
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The Korean Social Democratic Party and the Democratic Labor Party of south Korea issued an anti-Japanese joint statement Tuesday, the 92nd anniversary of the March First Popular Uprising.
					 The two parties bitterly condemned Japan for whitewashing its blood-stained past of aggression and plunder, far from making apology and reparation for the indelible hideous unethical crimes it committed against the Korean nation. They also blamed Japan for running amuck to attain its ambition for reinvasion of Korea and other Asian countries with the backing of the U.S., the statement said.
					
					 The two parties will resolutely reject the evermore undisguised triangular military tie-ups among the U.S., Japan and south Korea and wage dynamic struggle to shatter the moves of the Japanese militarists for reinvasion, it noted, and went on:
					
					 The two parties will stage unflinching actions to check and frustrate the anachronistic moves of the sycophantic and treacherous forces to tighten the "alliance" with outside forces and cooperate with them.
					
					 They will fully expose and denounce the dangerous moves of the sycophantic and treacherous forces unhesitatingly joining hands with sworn enemy Japan. Japan is now harassing peace on the Korean Peninsula and increasing the danger of war there while looking for an opportunity to stage a comeback to it. The two parties will positively struggle to shatter the moves.
					
					 The two parties will wage a more dynamic struggle to achieve the peace and reunification of the country under the uplifted banner of independence against outside forces by inheriting patriotism, the self-sacrificing spirit and the spirit of independence displayed by the participants of the March First Popular Uprising.
					
					 They will also take the lead in the grand march of the fellow countrymen for peace and reunification under the uplifted banner of the north-south joint declarations and thus discharge their sacred mission and duty for the times and the nation.

articles.title: Anniversary of 3.1 Popular Uprising Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of March First Popular Uprising Observed
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- 92 years have passed since the March First Popular Uprising. The uprising was specially recorded in the history of the Korean people's anti-Japanese struggle for national liberation.
					 It was a nationwide patriotic resistance to liberate Korea from the Japanese imperialists' rule and win the sovereignty of the Korean nation. 
					
					 After occupying Korea early in the 20th century the Japanese imperialists turned the whole of Korea into a large prison without bars through a mediaeval military rule.
					
					 The Korean people's pent-up grudge and resentment against their heinous colonial rule finally burst into a nationwide anti-Japanese resistance on March 1, 1919.
					
					 The massive anti-Japanese demonstration first started in Pyongyang which then developed into a nationwide resistance.
					
					 The patriotic youth and students and people stood in the van of the demonstration. They waged fierce fighting, defying the riot Japanese cavalry police and the military police, chanting slogans "Japanese and their army, out of Korea!" and "Long live the independence of Korea!"
					
					 With the struggle as a momentum, the demonstration rapidly spread to Seoul and other parts of Korea and even to overseas Koreans' communities in Manchuria, Shanghai, Maritime Province of Russia, Hawaii and other places.
					
					 The Korean people, who had keenly realized how miserable the lot of stateless people was, joined the uprising in all parts of the country irrespective of job, religious belief, age and sex.
					
					 The participants in the uprising stormed and destroyed the ruling organs of the Japanese imperialists and punished aggressors and traitors to the nation without mercy.
					
					 Within the three months after the start of the uprising, more than two million people of all social strata joined it and by the end of the year the number of demonstrations and seditions totaled over 3,200.
					
					 The uprising dealt telling blows at the Japanese imperialist aggressors and demonstrated the strong independent spirit, indomitable stamina and ardent patriotism of the Koreans all over the world.

articles.title: Tree Planting Campaign
articles.content:
Tree Planting Campaign
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Many people, including schoolchildren, have planted a large number of trees throughout the DPRK on Wednesday, the tree-planting day.
					 Youth and students of Pyongyang have planted trees at the Pothonggang Revolutionary Site.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung initiated the Pothong river improvement project and broke ground first to signal the start of the project at the site in May Juche 35 (1946) a year after the country's liberation from the Japanese colonial rule.
					
					 After planting, they supported saplings with props.
					
					 Han Mo Ran, 16, a student of Pyongyang Jonsung Secondary School, told KCNA, "I want to plant many trees to make my hometown, Pyongyang, more beautiful."
					
					 They planted thousands of trees at the site.

articles.title: Progress Made in Modernizing Communication
articles.content:
Progress Made in Modernizing Communication
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Great progress has been made in the field of communication in the DPRK through the modernization drive.
					 It completed the project of setting up an optical fiber cable network based on the advanced technology. On this basis it built the world-level information superhighway and established 3G mobile communication network system across the country. 
					
					 A satellite communication system of our own style has been built thanks to the rapid growth of satellite communication capability based on the latest technology. 
					
					 The communication optical fiber cable network was put on digital and automatic basis, radically updating the country's communication structure. 
					
					 The Pyongyang Optical Fiber Cable Factory has strongly backed the project. 
					
					 The nationwide optical fiber cable network system has been established amid the completion of communication infrastructure. The optical fiber communication network has been updated as a digital technology. The previous telephone switching system has been completely converted into a digital one and an automatic switching capacity of telephone has expanded nearly twenty times as against the past. 
					
					 The communication machine plants have been updated and delicate and highly efficient communication equipment and materials have been mass-produced, positively promoting the modernization of the optical fiber communication. 
					
					 The introduction of optical fibre cable to all parts of the country on the basis of up-to-date technology paved a wide avenue for developing the nation's tele-communication in the shortest possible time as desired.
					
					 This success helped cover the country with a network of high-speed communications of the world's advanced level.
					
					 The units in the field of communications have boosted the transmission band of communications between Pyongyang and provinces hundreds of times in a matter of half a year.
					
					 A large-capacity high speed communications channel of the world's high level has been built in a matter of one year, increasing the transmission capacity thousands of times. 
					
					 The formation of high-speed communications network made it possible to ensure on a high level telephone, data and mobile communications, the dissemination of science and technology, distance education, on-line healthcare, video conference, etc.
					
					 A 3G mobile communications network has been formed throughout the country to facilitate telephone and mail services and render diverse services including transmission of image and multimedia.
					
					 A micro satellite communications network has been laid to provide a reliable guarantee for command communications for state economic management under any circumstances.
					
					 All the satellite communications and TV relay equipment have been digitalized in a brief span of time to digitalize the TV relay of international events by satellite. 
					
					 High quality TV transmission equipment has been successfully installed to ensure international tele-communication and TV relay of international events by satellite on the highest level.
					
					 Thanks to the establishment of satellite communications system of Korean style, the nation's tele-communication network is capable of successfully ensuring any international conference and event.

articles.title: Weather Expected to Be Unfavorable for Farming
articles.content:
Weather Expected to Be Unfavorable for Farming
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The temperature of Korea this year is forecasted to be as usual or little lower than the average in spring and summer and little higher in autumn, said an agricultural expert.
					 Prof. and Dr. Sin Yong Gil, an academician of the Academy of Agricultural Science, told KCNA that the precipitation will stand little smaller than the average in spring and larger in summer and autumn.
					
					 A low temperature is expected in March and dry weather in April in most areas of the country, he said. Some areas will apparently have much rainfall in July and the east coastal areas will be affected by coolness in July and August. 
					
					 He underscored the need for the agricultural sector to pay attention to the weather conditions in manuring and cultivating crops.

articles.title: Many Sculptures to Be Created
articles.content:
Many Sculptures to Be Created
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The Merited Sculpture Group of the Mansudae Art Studio is working hard to create many masterworks until the centenary birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					Over the past five decades, the group has created many monuments like the Chollima Statue and the Samjiyon Grand Monument. During the years, a lot of its sculptors won Kim Il Sung Prize and the titles of Labor Hero and People's and Merited Artists.
					
					The group successfully made marble statues of President Kim Il Sung some time ago.
					
					It is now creating sculptures showing his revolutionary feats and other works to be placed in the Pyongyang Folklore Park now under construction.
					
					It is also making decorations for bridges and parks in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Korean Art Gallery
articles.content:
Korean Art Gallery
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The Korean Art Gallery situated on the banks of the River Taedong is one of the nation's storehouses of cultural assets.
					 The gallery, with a floor space of more than 10,000 square meters, houses art pieces showing the development of Juche-based fine arts. Conspicuous in the exhibits are those picturing activities and noble virtues of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu -- President Kim Il Sung, General Secretary Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk.  
					
					 Some of the exhibits mirror the time-honored culture and traditions of the Korean nation.
					
					 The gallery boasts of famous art pieces dating back to the period of Koryo and the Ri Dynasty. 
					
					 Visitors also can enjoy recently discovered art pieces portraying Kim Il Sung drawn in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle. Among them are "Commander of Guerrillas", "Commander Kim's Order Rocks Mt. Changbai" and "Commander Kim Il Sung Elaborating Operation Plan".
					
					 Korean paintings, oil paintings, sculptures and embroideries are also on display.
					
					 National art exhibitions are held often at the gallery.

articles.title: Okryu Mineral Spring
articles.content:
Okryu Mineral Spring
						
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- There is the Okryu Mineral Spring on the banks of the Taedong River in Pyongyang.     
					 The 190-meter-deep spring contains chlorine, calcium bicarbonate, sodium, iron and other ingredients good for health. 
					
					 The mineral water is efficacious for chronic gastritis, gastric and duodenal ulcers, chronic enteritis and colitis, chronic bronchitis, diabetes, skin diseases, hypertension and peripheral nervous disorder. 
					
					 Kim Hyon Suk, a 78-year-old woman in Taedonggang District, Pyongyang, told KCNA that she has taken the mineral water for two decades to enjoy a good health.
					
					 The spring was named by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: US, S. Korea Urged to Stop War Gambles--NPCK Spokesman
articles.content:
US, S. Korea Urged to Stop War Gambles--NPCK Spokesman
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and south Korean authorities should promptly discontinue DPRK-targeted joint military exercises, Key Resolve and Foal Eagle, said a spokesman for the National Peace Committee of Korea in a statement Wednesday. 
					 The U.S. and south Korean warmongers are staging the madcap war gambles with huge armed forces and nuclear war equipment, strong enough to conduct an overall war, involved, revealing their scheme to overthrow the DPRK system. They announced that the exercises are aimed to "remove the nukes and missiles" of someone and "cope with contingency". 
					
					 They have asserted that the ongoing exercises are for "defence", but this is absurd sophism to cover up their aggressive nature, evade the blame for having driven the situation of the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war and mislead the public opinion at home and abroad, the statement pointed out. 
					
					 It further said: 
					
					 The south Korean authorities claim that "the door for dialogue is open", questioning someone's "sincerity", though they are getting hell-bent on the war moves to harm their dialogue partner by force. This is a very shameless and ridiculous behavior. 
					
					 The present developments remind one of the days when traitor Syngman Rhee ignited a war of aggression on the DPRK in collusion with foreign forces in reply to the patriotic appeal made by the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea on the eve of the last Korean War, which carried a proposal for preventing permanent division of the nation and achieving peaceful reunification of the country. 
					
					 By nature, the U.S. and south Korean authorities are not interested in the north-south dialogue, detente and peace, but seek only confrontation and war for aggression on the DPRK. 
					
					 As already declared, the army and people of the DPRK will deal a resolute and merciless blow to those who dare attempt to violate the dignity of the nation even in the least and overthrow the system of the DPRK.

articles.title: KCNA on New US National Military Strategy Report
articles.content:
KCNA on New US National Military Strategy Report
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The United States recently made public a new national military strategy report. 
					 The report said the U.S. strategic duty and interests would be further shifted to the Asia-Pacific region as the days go by. "We will work with the Japan 'Self-Defense Forces' to improve their out-of-area operational capabilities," it said. It is necessary to further increase the U.S. forces' influence in Southeast Asia and South Asia, the report added.
					
					 In a word, this reflects part of the U.S. politico-military strategy aiming at a stronger position as an Asia-Pacific state in the new century. 
					
					 A rapid change is taking place in the economic and military equilibrium of the Asia-Pacific region in the new century. China, India and various other countries are appearing as emerging powers. 
					
					 This proves that the 21st century is becoming a century of Asia-Pacific. 
					
					 The U.S. is, therefore, citing "military threat" from the DPRK, China and other countries as a pretext for taking the initiative in the region. This is absolutely unreasonable. 
					
					 The U.S. military muscle retains an unchallenged edge as strategic forces made of strategic nuclear attack force, the missile defense system and steadily updated basic facilities. Its strategic nuclear force is capable of destroying the world several times and its MD has already formed limited networks of shields. The three services of the U.S. forces including long-range missile forces and strategic bombers are capable of conducting worldwide operations and have a dense network of bases of its military alliance in different parts of the world. 
					
					 U.S. F-22 stealth fighters of the fifth generation have been already deployed in the Asia-Pacific region and its aircraft carrier flotillas freely move in various parts of the world including the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. claims that the defense capabilities of the DPRK and China are threatening others. This is like a guilty party filing the suit first. In this regard, the Chinese People's Daily on Feb. 21 refuted the U.S. claim, saying it is as illogical as to assert one may set fire to other's house, while the other should not be allowed to kindle a candle. 
					
					 The above-said strategy report is a dangerous document to overpower the potential rivals, maintain military domination and spark a new Cold War in the Asia-Pacific region. 
					
					 The U.S. military threat to the region will compel countries in the region to markedly increase their efforts to bolster up their self-reliant defense capabilities.

articles.title: KCNA on Story about March Crisis Afloat in S. Korea
articles.content:
US Backing for Enlarged Jewish Settlements Censured
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Palestinians are enraged at the stance taken by the United States to patronize Israel's expansion of Jewish settlements.
					 As already known, only the U.S. at the UNSC consisting of 15 member nations on February 18 put a veto on the resolution Arab countries presented to condemn Israel's expansion of settlements. 
					
					 The Palestine Liberation Organization called an emergency meeting on the night of Feb. 18 to bitterly condemn this imprudent behavior.
					
					 There were anti-U.S demos of Palestinians in Ramallah and other areas on the West Bank. 
					
					 They branded the U.S. veto as an act of hostility toward the Palestinians. Demanding an apology from the U.S., they launched a campaign of boycotting any relation with the U.S. while rejecting its aid. 
					
					 Roar of wrath has been heard from among other Arab countries. 
					
					 The U.S. veto clearly showed discord between its words and actions over the Mideast problem and spoiled the worldwide efforts for regional peace, the Jordanian House of Deputies of National Assembly said in a statement. 
					
					 They are a due reaction to the U.S. criminal behavior, violation and insult to the Palestinian people's dignity and sovereignty.
					
					 This is not the first time the U.S. has ever used its veto in UN arena in defence of Israel infringing upon the Palestinians' legitimate rights. According to unofficial statistics by foreign press reports, it has cast its veto 83 times so far.
					
					 In fact the U.S. has absolutely backed Israel. The same goes for the recent case. 
					
					 Israel resumed peace talks with Palestine last September, but has been pushing ahead with enlargement of its settlements for territorial expansion behind their curtain. Such action soon brought the talks to a rupture. 
					
					 Enraged at this, Arab countries submitted to the UNSC the resolution denouncing Israel's expansion of settlements and breakdown of peace process last December. 
					
					 The U.S. delayed a vote on the resolution while pressing Palestine to make concession. The latter did not yield to this pressure and, after all, the former used its veto against the resolution. 
					
					 An official of Palestine told reporters that the world is of the same view that Israel's construction of settlements is illegal and that of the 192 members nations of the UN, the U.S. is likely to be the only objector to the resolution. 
					
					 This behavior of the U.S. protecting Israel keen on territorial expansion is a challenge to the unanimous desire of the international community for a fair solution to the Palestinian issue. 
					
					 The U.S. policy for domination over the Mideast region and its protection of Israel on this basis will plunge the U.S. into a more awkward position in the region.

articles.title: KCNA Assails Crime Committed by GI against S. Korean Old Couple
articles.content:
KCNA Assails Crime Committed by GI against S. Korean Old Couple
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- A soldier belonging to the 2nd Division of the U.S. imperialist aggression troops present in south Korea broke into a house in Tongduchon City, Kyonggi Province, and assaulted an old couple with a lethal weapon on Feb. 26.
					 It is needless to say that this is the height of human rights abuses and an unpardonable insult to the dignity of the Korean nation.
					
					 This crime is by no means limited to this area and it is not the first of its kind, either.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists openly commit violence and murder against south Koreans at any place and any time regardless of age and sex.
					
					 Five cases of various crimes are committed by GIs in south Korea on a daily average. The number of the crimes disclosed before the world reaches hundreds of thousands.
					
					 Not a day passes in the U.S. military bases in different parts of south Korea without their crimes. 
					
					 Typical examples of them are the incident of forcing hair cutting upon a Korean woman in Tongduchon, the incident of killing Yun Kum I, the mass-killings of Koreans in the U.S. air force base in Songthan and the incident of killing Sin Hyo Sun and Sim Mi Son.
					
					 The U.S. military bases and their vicinities are the strongholds of Yankees for committing murder, arson, destruction and plunder, their main attribute, and dens of evils and crimes.
					
					 This goes to prove that the U.S. military bases are nothing but nooses tightening the necks of the south Korean people. 
					
					 This being a hard reality, the U.S. made no mention of the dismantlement of the U.S. military bases. Worse still, it is going so foolish as to let the above-said criminal go scot-free from the outset.
					
					 This once again betrays the arrogance of the occupiers behaving as rulers over south Korea, exercising extraterritorial rights. 
					
					 All the Koreans clearly remember the fact that the U.S. declared "not guilty" the GIs who mercilessly killed two schoolgirls by driving their armored car over them in broad daylight and whisked them away to the U.S.
					
					 If the U.S. pays no heed to the demand of the south Korean people for taking a strong legal action against the criminal just as it did at that time, this will be a wanton violation of justice and conscience.
					
					 The south Korean people's misfortune and pain will go on and all the Koreans will not be able to escape disaster and catastrophe unless the U.S. military bases are dismantled.

articles.title: Japan Can Never Hide Truth about Its Crimes--KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Japan Can Never Hide Truth about Its Crimes--KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Information disclosing the truth about the Japanese imperialists' drafting of Koreans for forced labor is being disclosed one after another. 
					 Disclosed recently was a new result of survey that about 650 of the Koreans who were forced to work for the construction of an anti-air raid shelter for the general headquarters of the Imperial Japanese Army in the closing years of the Pacific War died in the work site. It was meant to be used as its general command post.
					
					 A relevant body of Japan said on Feb. 28 that the toll was estimated through the survey conducted from 2006 on the basis of testimonies made by persons concerned, available results of survey, etc. 
					
					 The shelter was to be used as headquarters where the command of Japanese ground force was located to command the Pacific War and a shelter which might function as a royal palace in case of a contingency.
					
					 Japan constructed underground facilities in top secret in various places around Mts. Sho, Maizuru, Minagami, etc. in the area of Matsushiro, Nagano Prefecture from October 1944 up to right before its defeat in 1945. 
					
					 "According to the testimony made by a survivor, more than one worker died everyday during the construction", said the information.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists forcibly drafted at least 8.4 million young and middle aged Koreans to slave labor sites and shambles of war during their colonial fascist rule over Korea, forcing them to die with grudge.
					
					 They forced at least 2,000 Koreans to slave in chains for the construction of the shelter for the Matsushiro general headquarters from April 1945 up to the day they suffered their defeat. They committed the monstrous massacre of all of them in the end.
					
					 But this is just a tip of iceberg of the crimes related to the unprecedentedly harsh labor committed by the Japanese imperialists against the Koreans. The crimes committed by them can never be written off. 
					
					 Japan should admit the crimes and make sincere apology and reparation for them.

articles.title: KCNA on Sudanese Division
articles.content:
KCNA on Sudanese Division
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Sudan is divided into the north and south. What is the root cause of the division and whether it is the way of solving the issue of Sudan are under discussion in the international community.
					 The division of Sudan is the direct aftermath of the colonial rule of the imperialists. Many analysts agree with this view.
					
					 Khalid Dirar, a researcher at the al-Rasid Center for Strategic Studies in Khartoum, at an interview told historical and psychological accumulations enhanced by colonial policies have caused a pre-attitude in the southern Sudanese minds that the north treats the south with superiority.
					
					 Sudan is a multi-nationality country where more than 500 tribes live. Sudan derives its name from black people in Arabic. The Sudanese have called their country the heart of Africa as their country looks like a heart in shape.
					
					 75 percent of its population is Arabs and Southern Sudan is inhabited mostly by African black people.
					
					 They consist of various tribes. Most of them live in the three regions of Southern Sudan. People in Northern and Central Sudan are Muslims and those in Southern Sudan are Christians.
					
					 They were subject to colonialists' invasion from the 70s of the 19th century and had been under the colonial rule of the imperialists since 1877. The Sudanese people waged a vigorous struggle to achieve national independence from the colonialists from the very day the imperialists invaded their country. Their struggle for national independence and liberation mounted after the Second World War, in particular. The imperialists worked hard to sow the seeds of antagonism and discord among the black people in Southern Sudan and Arabs in Northern Sudan in a bid to keep Southern Sudan at least under permanent occupation. 
					
					 However, the Sudanese people frustrated the moves of the imperialists to divide and rule Northern and Southern Sudan and proclaimed independence from their colonial rule on Jan. 1, 1956. 
					
					 After its independence, there were ceaseless political instability and mayhem due to the separatist moves of the imperialists and fierce scrambles of right-wing political parties for power. A frequent power change took place. 
					
					 In June 1969, the government granted regional autonomy to Southern Sudan which had waged an armed revolt since 1963.
					
					 A peace accord was signed between the government and rebel groups in Khartoum in April 1997, but the civil war went on.
					
					 A Sudanese political analyst in Southern Sudan said that colonialism isolated Southern Sudan and barred the two parts of Sudan from having mutual deals, aggravating the conflict that had existed between the two parts long ago.
					
					 He added that the attempt of some key politicians of the north to politicize religion, in particular, rendered the issue more serious and religion was one of the factors that deepened the conflict between the north and the south.
					
					 A referendum took place in Southern Sudan in a peaceful atmosphere and the government of the north immediately recognized the results of division. But, it is hard to expect the so-called honeymoon between the north and the south will go on for a long time.
					
					 Analysts are concerned that the independence of Southern Sudan after division does not mean the complete healing of the wound in the heart of Africa and, on the contrary, it may be a curtain-raiser to a new conflict between the north and the south.

articles.title: Integral Whole Guarantees Victory and Future of DPRK
articles.content:
Integral Whole Guarantees Victory and Future of DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The harmonious whole of the leader and the people in the DPRK provides an invincible treasured sword for victoriously advancing the cause of Korean-style socialism, says DPRK major paper Rodong Sinmun in a bylined article Wednesday.
					 The true picture of the DPRK and source of its power lie in the harmonious whole, the article says, adding that to believe the future of Songun Korea is to believe the might of this harmonious whole.
					
					 It goes on to say:
					
					 We are living in the stirring times in which the integral whole which has been consolidated through history reached its highest stage.
					
					The credit for this goes to General Secretary Kim Jong Il who has great love for the people.
					
					 His world of love for the people is full of a noble sense of obligation to take responsibility for the future of the country and the people to the last.
					
					 The harmonious whole of the DPRK represents the unity unprecedented in the history of the revolutionary struggle of the working class.
					
					 It has a peculiar character in terms of the formation of unity and history of its development, ideological foundation of unity and its organizational solidity and the method of combining leadership and popular masses and its style.
					
					 In the present era of a great surge the harmonious whole has further developed into the most powerful unity by which the leader and the people have become an integral whole sharing weal and woe.
					
					 The harmonious whole will never change no matter how many generations are replaced by the other. Herein lie its solidity and might. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will perform steady miracles and feats in building a thriving socialist nation in the future, too, by dint of the integral whole rallied close around Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: US-S. Korea Test Nuclear War Exercises Targeted against DPRK Flailed
articles.content:
US-S. Korea Test Nuclear War Exercises Targeted against DPRK Flailed
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises now being staged by the U.S. in collusion with south Korea are a grave military threat and provocation to the DPRK, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a bylined commentary.
					 The said saber-rattling is a large-scale dangerous test war to ignite an all-out nuclear war under the scenario to do harm to the DPRK by force of arms from A to Z, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. decided to include the expansion and intensification of the drills to cope with the "contingency" under the simulated conditions after someone's "collapse" in the contents of Key Resolve and Foal Eagle this year. This fully reveals the aggressive nature and danger of the drills.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that a U.S. aircraft carrier is involved in the maneuvers. Last year, too, the U.S. imperialists brought its aircraft carrier to the East Sea and West Sea of Korea for madcap war maneuvers.
					
					 While frequently dispatching its aircraft carrier there, the U.S. seeks to ignite the second Korean war anytime.
					
					 It is the invariable stand and principle of the DPRK to react to good faith with good faith and strength with strength. The DPRK is ready for both dialogue and war.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to stop at once the criminal war racket, not misjudging the principled stand of the DPRK.

articles.title: Newspapers Observe Tree-planting Day
articles.content:
Newspapers Observe Tree-planting Day 
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Major newspapers Wednesday editorially observe the tree-planting day. 
					President Kim Il Sung climbed the Moran Hill together with General Secretary Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese war hero, on March 2, 1946 to unroll a grand plan for turning the country into a picturesque land of bliss. The precious instruction given by the President on the significant day marked a historic occasion of providing a curtain-raiser to the tree-planting campaign in the country.
					
					 It is the unanimous desire and will of the Korean people to turn the whole country into a thick woodland and greenery so as to build the mountains and rivers of the country into a socialist fairyland true to the will and desire of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu, says Rodong Sinmun. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Afforestation is a noble patriotic one for the people's happiness and the country's prosperity and a nature-harnessing project of lasting value. 
					
					 A project to turn the whole country into a thick woodland and greenery is making dynamic progress thanks to the endless forced march made by Kim Jong Il for field guidance. He clarified the importance of afforestation and indicated the orientation and ways for carrying out them, wisely steering the work. 
					
					 Minju Joson calls upon all the officials and other working people to turn out as one in the drive for spring tree planting so as to make a positive contribution to eternally glorifying the immortal feats performed by the three commanders of Mt. Paektu in the field of land management and converting the country into a socialist fairyland.

articles.title: US Backing for Enlarged Jewish Settlements Censured
articles.content:
US Backing for Enlarged Jewish Settlements Censured
						
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Palestinians are enraged at the stance taken by the United States to patronize Israel's expansion of Jewish settlements.
					 As already known, only the U.S. at the UNSC consisting of 15 member nations on February 18 put a veto on the resolution Arab countries presented to condemn Israel's expansion of settlements. 
					
					 The Palestine Liberation Organization called an emergency meeting on the night of Feb. 18 to bitterly condemn this imprudent behavior.
					
					 There were anti-U.S demos of Palestinians in Ramallah and other areas on the West Bank. 
					
					 They branded the U.S. veto as an act of hostility toward the Palestinians. Demanding an apology from the U.S., they launched a campaign of boycotting any relation with the U.S. while rejecting its aid. 
					
					 Roar of wrath has been heard from among other Arab countries. 
					
					 The U.S. veto clearly showed discord between its words and actions over the Mideast problem and spoiled the worldwide efforts for regional peace, the Jordanian House of Deputies of National Assembly said in a statement. 
					
					 They are a due reaction to the U.S. criminal behavior, violation and insult to the Palestinian people's dignity and sovereignty.
					
					 This is not the first time the U.S. has ever used its veto in UN arena in defence of Israel infringing upon the Palestinians' legitimate rights. According to unofficial statistics by foreign press reports, it has cast its veto 83 times so far.
					
					 In fact the U.S. has absolutely backed Israel. The same goes for the recent case. 
					
					 Israel resumed peace talks with Palestine last September, but has been pushing ahead with enlargement of its settlements for territorial expansion behind their curtain. Such action soon brought the talks to a rupture. 
					
					 Enraged at this, Arab countries submitted to the UNSC the resolution denouncing Israel's expansion of settlements and breakdown of peace process last December. 
					
					 The U.S. delayed a vote on the resolution while pressing Palestine to make concession. The latter did not yield to this pressure and, after all, the former used its veto against the resolution. 
					
					 An official of Palestine told reporters that the world is of the same view that Israel's construction of settlements is illegal and that of the 192 members nations of the UN, the U.S. is likely to be the only objector to the resolution. 
					
					 This behavior of the U.S. protecting Israel keen on territorial expansion is a challenge to the unanimous desire of the international community for a fair solution to the Palestinian issue. 
					
					 The U.S. policy for domination over the Mideast region and its protection of Israel on this basis will plunge the U.S. into a more awkward position in the region.

articles.title: US-S. Korean Joint Saber-rattling under Fire in S. Korea
articles.content:
US-S. Korean Joint Saber-rattling under Fire in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Democratic Labor Party and the New Progressive Party and at least 20 civic and social organizations at a news conference in Seoul on Feb. 28 blasted the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers for staging the joint military maneuvers to invade the north.
					 They declared that the joint military exercises now under way under the pretext of "comprehensively coping with the contingency" are obviously not defensive ones but offensive ones for invading the north. 
					
					 Recalling that the military clashes took place in the West Sea of Korea last year due to the provocations of the war-like military forces, they demanded the authorities stop the actions escalating the military tension and conflict on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 They urged the authorities to halt at once the above-said military exercises launched in collusion with foreign forces and come out for dialogue with the north.
					
					 At least 60 civic and social bodies including the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification and the Solidarity for Progress on the same day held a joint rally before a command post of the "Command of the south Korea-U.S. Combined Forces" in Kyonggi Province to denounce the ongoing military maneuvers.

articles.title: Tok Islets: Inalienable Parts of Korea's Territory
articles.content:
Tok Islets: Inalienable Parts of Korea's Territory
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The north affirmed that Tok islets are inalienable parts of Korea's territory on Feb. 25, criticizing residents in Shimane Prefecture for transferring their domicile of origin to the islets," according to the south Korean MBC.
					 A room chief of the History Institute of the Academy of Social Sciences of the north said that the Shimane Prefectural government's "claim to Tok Islets" at the event "Takeshima Day" on Feb. 22 is a proof of Japan's distortion of history, said the MBC.

articles.title: Songun Meeting of Youth for General Mobilization Reported in S. Korea
articles.content:
Songun Meeting of Youth for General Mobilization Reported in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean CBS on Feb. 27 carried an account of the Songun Meeting of Youth for General Mobilization held in Pyongyang.
					 The meeting called upon all young people of the DPRK to become fervent implementers of the plan of the Workers' Party of Korea for building a thriving nation and play a key role in honorably defending the socialist system, the CBS said, quoting the Central Broadcasting of Korea.

articles.title: GI in S. Korea Assaults Old Couple
articles.content:
GI in S. Korea Assaults Old Couple
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- A solider belonging to the 2nd Division of the U.S. imperialist aggression troops present in south Korea assaulted old inhabitants at random on Feb. 26, according to south Korea's Yonhap News.
					 In the morning of that day this offender intruded into a house in Tongduchon City, Kyonggi Province, where he attacked a couple in seventies with a weapon and robbed them of a cellular phone.
					
					 The seriously wounded couple was reported to undergo medical treatment in a hospital.

articles.title: Struggle for Peace Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle for Peace Declared in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Members of civic and public organizations in south Korea on Feb. 19 had a ceremony for declaring the movement for conclusion of peace treaty in 2011.
					 The organizations included the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Confederation of Trade Unions.
					
					 Speakers at the ceremony said that the recent acute situation of the Korean Peninsula showed that it was a very urgent task to conclude a peace treaty at an early date.
					
					 Criticizing the U.S. for having instigated the present "government" keen on confrontation with fellow countrymen to stage the madcap war exercises against the DPRK, they said that they would not remain an onlooker to such maneuvers.
					
					 A resolution, read out at the ceremony, called upon the progressive forces to wage a massive struggle in unity for forcing the U.S. to conclude a treaty for peace of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It stressed that they would build up the international opinion for conclusion of a peace treaty and, at the same time, conduct a vigorous struggle for pullout of the U.S. forces from south Korea and break of the humiliating south Korea-U.S. alliance.

articles.title: Application of Tuition-waiver Program to Korean Schools Called for
articles.content:
Application of Tuition-waiver Program to Korean Schools Called for
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- A meeting calling for prompt application of the tuition-waiver program to the Korean schools took place in Japan on Feb. 26.
					 Present there were members of the Liaison Association against the Exclusion of Korean Schools from Tuition-waiver Program for Senior High Schools grouping more than 320 civic and public organizations of Japan, Japanese citizens, thousands of compatriots in the area of Kanto and Korean students.
					
					 Kazuo Hasegawa, representative of the liaison association, said in his address that he could not repress resentment at the Japanese government which excluded only the Korean schools from the said program, thus further stirring up human rights abuses, prejudice, discrimination and chauvinism in the Japanese society.
					
					 He reiterated his will to carry on the struggle till the program is applied nationwide in protest against the Japanese government which tramples down the right of the students of the Korean schools to learning.
					
					 The principal of the Korean Middle and High School in Tokyo, the representative of the society of mothers of the Korean Schools and representatives of students of the Korean Schools said in their speeches that it is natural for Koreans to learn their spoken and written languages and history, calling for preserving the Juche character and the national character in the future, too, in order to protect the national education.
					
					 Personages of Japanese organizations also took the floor at the meeting.
					
					 The meeting adopted a resolution urging the Japanese government to immediately apply the program to the Korean schools and thus guarantee the students of Korean schools the right to learning.

articles.title: DPRK's Steps against US-S. Korea Military Drills Hailed
articles.content:
DPRK's Steps against US-S. Korea Military Drills Hailed
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on Feb. 22 denounced the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises, Key Resolve and Foal Eagle, as war gambles for aggression on the DPRK.  
					 The exercises show that the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean authorities do not want to see improved north-south relations and detente of the Korean Peninsula, they said in a joint statement.
					
					 The DPRK wants peace, but will never remain an onlooker to their provocative moves for a war, the statement said, adding:
					
					 We will fully support every measure to be taken by the DPRK and the Korean People's Army.

articles.title: US-S. Korea Military Exercises Rapped by British
articles.content:
US-S. Korea Military Exercises Rapped by British 
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association in a statement on Feb. 24 protested against Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises of the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers.
					 The exercises are an action of casting a chill over the broad-minded peace proposal made by the DPRK to defuse the tension on the Korean Peninsula and build confidence between the north and the south, the statement said.
					
					 The DPRK, independent and peace-loving, recently made a series of important and constructive proposals for detente, confidence-building between the north and the south, peace and reunification, it recalled, saying:
					
					 But, the south Korean authorities turned down those peace proposals and intentionally brought to rupture the preliminary talks for opening the north-south high-level military talks held with much effort.
					
					 The joint military exercises for aggression reveal the true colors of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces as an aggressor and provoker of a war.
					
					 They are a wanton violation of the DPRK's independence and dignity, and lurking behind them is a sinister intention to torpedo down socialist Juche Korea.
					
					 We strongly demand that the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces cancel their joint military drills at once and stop the provocations to the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated Abroad
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries between Feb. 15 and 25 to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 They were a seminar on his work "The Juche Philosophy Is an Original Revolutionary Philosophy" in Dominica, a reception and a film show in Russia and a film show in Holland.
					
					 Films shown included "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation" and "A Broad Bellflower".
					
					 The president of the Revolutionary Alternative Party of Dominica and other speakers at the seminar vehemently condemned the U.S. imperialists for their vicious provocations against the DPRK, adding that the DPRK, an impregnable stronghold, would emerge victorious, repelling any aggression of the imperialists at one blow.
					
					 The chief of the Tynda City Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of the Russian Philosophy Association said at the reception that Kim Jong Il is the great leader who is enriching the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and wisely guiding the Korean people in building a thriving nation with his energetic Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 The Juche idea, which is being widely disseminated worldwide across oceans and continents, is the revolutionary doctrine to be followed by humankind, he added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Feats Lauded
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Feats Lauded
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy issued a joint statement on Feb. 16 in celebration of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					 The statement noted that Kim Jong Il was born in the secret camp on Mt. Paektu and grew up to be successor to the revolutionary cause of Juche. He authored a large number of works to develop in depth the Juche idea and indicated the orientation and ways for defending and advancing the cause of socialism, it added.
					
					 He bolstered up the Juche-based defence capability of the DPRK and thus turned it into a socialist military power able to defeat any aggressors with its independent nuclear deterrent, the statement said.
					
					 Under his Songun leadership the national dignity of the Koreans is shining all over the world, it stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised Abroad
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of Russia and Egypt celebrated the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The Russian newspaper Veteran carried in its 7th issue a photo of Kim Jong Il waving back to the cheering crowd and an article titled "The person loved by the people".
					
					 The article said: Kim Jong Il, leader of the DPRK, always worships and respects the people. That is why his politics has always served the people and there has been built in the DPRK the socialist system centered on the popular masses in which the people are masters of everything and everything serves them.
					
					 The Egyptian newspaper Al-Misaiya on Feb. 22 carried an article titled "Kim Jong Il revered by the people".
					
					 The article stressed that he is most perfectly realizing the people's desire to live in harmony while helping and leading forward with each other.
					
					 His benevolent politics is a sure guarantee that turned the society of the DPRK into a big harmonious family, it said.

articles.title: China to Repair Reservoirs
articles.content:
China to Repair Reservoirs
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The Standing Conference of the State Council of China recently adopted a plan to repair 5,400 reservoirs till the end of 2012 and 15,900 till the end of 2013.
					 In recent years China has channeled efforts into reinforcing dangerous spots of the reservoirs in order to prevent flood damage.
					
					 As a result, 161 million wu of cultivated land is free from the threat of inundation and the life of 144 million people and their properties are protected, taking the country as a whole.

articles.title: Azalea, Reminder of Anti-Japanese Heroine
articles.content:
Azalea, Reminder of Anti-Japanese Heroine
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- On February 27 General Secretary Kim Jong Il was pleased to see a rare flower at a conference hall. 
					 An official briefed the leader on the flower bred by horticulturists of a foreign country after years of research.
					
					 They sent the flower to Korea, wishing that it would be named after Kim Jong Suk, mother of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il appreciated them for the beautiful and long-blown flower. He then said that his mother loved azalea so that the flower serves as a reminder of her.

articles.title: New Air Conditioning System for Restaurant
articles.content:
New Air Conditioning System for Restaurant
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- One October day in Juche 99 (2010) General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the newly-built delicacy restaurant under Okryu Restaurant.
					 Going round the fashionable dining halls, he asked about the air conditioning system.
					
					 An official of the restaurant told him that each hall's temperature is adjusted by two large air conditioners. But the leader said the two are not enough for a glass-walled dining hall. He then indicated ways of solving the air conditioning problem.
					
					 Later, the restaurant had a new air conditioining system in each dining hall.

articles.title: RPDC se esforzara por un nuevo mundo sin armas nucleares
articles.content:
RPDC se esforzara por un nuevo mundo sin armas nucleares
Pyongyang, 2 de marzo (ATCC) -- En el futuro tambien, la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hara todo lo posible con responsabilidad por el desarme nuclear y un nuevo mundo sin armas nucleares, dijo asi el 24 de febrero el delegado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en la sesion plenaria de la Conferencia de Ginebra sobre el Desarme. 
					En la actualidad, la humanidad tiene la tarea apremiante de prevenir la carrera armamentista nuclear, promover el desarme nuclear y realizar la desnuclearizacion del mundo, ratifico y continuo:
					
					La comunidad internacional debe tomar las medidas para eliminar definitivamente todos los elementos que puedan acarrear la catastrofe nuclear. 
					
					El desarme nuclear no es un simple problema de la paz y seguridad del mundo, sino es un asunto apremiante relacionado directamente con la existencia de la humanidad.
					
					La RPDC apoya invariablemente la abolicion completa y global de armas nucleares en el orbe. 
					
					Tomando por meta la abolicion total de armas nucleares, los paises con esos armamentos deben parar de inmediato el desarrollo y la mejora cualitativa de armas nucleares y establecer el plan comprensivo para reducirlas y los medios de su transporte. 
					
					Con motivo de la conferencia de revision del TNP efectuada en 2000, los paises con armas nucleares comprometieron por primera vez el desmantelamiento de las armas nucleares, pero todavia no se han tomando las medidas practicas. No se puede asegurar el desarme nuclear solo con los aparatos institucionales existentes. 
					
					Por lo tanto, para lograr el desarme nuclear es indispensable promover a la vez las negociaciones bilaterales y las multilaterales. 
					
					Los paises con armas nucleares deben prometer incondicionalmente el no uso de armas nucleares y sentarse pronto a la mesa de negociaciones para alcanzar un acuerdo internacional del particular.

articles.title: Unidad monolitica es garantia de victoria y futuro de Corea
articles.content:
Unidad monolitica es garantia de victoria y futuro de Corea
Pyongyang, 2 de marzo (ATCC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun publico en su edicion de este miercoles un articulo individual destacando que la unidad monolitica es el remedio omnipotente para el avance victorioso de la causa socialista al estilo coreano. 
					En la unidad monolitica esta el verdadero aspecto de Corea y la fuente de su poderio, comienza el articulo y prosigue:
					
					Confiar en el futuro de la Corea del Songun significa confiar en el poderio de la unidad monolitica. 
					
					En la epoca actual se manifiesta plenamente la unidad monolitica de nuestro pais consolidada y desarrollada historicamente, gracias al gran amor por el pueblo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien toma por su noble mision responsabilizarse del futuro de la patria y el pueblo. 
					
					La unidad monolitica de Corea, nunca vista en la historia de la lucha revolucionaria de la clase obrera, tiene caracteristicas peculiares tanto en el curso de formacion y desarrollo y en la base ideologica y solidez organizativa como en el modo de combinacion de la direccion con las masas populares. 
					
					En la actual epoca de gran auge, la unidad monolitica se desarrolla como la mas poderosa y fraternal entre el Dirigente y el pueblo. 
					
					El ejercito y pueblo de Corea crearan incesantemente nuevos milagros y meritos en la construccion de la gran potencia prospera socialista con el poderio de esa eterna unidad en torno al Dirigente.

articles.title: CNCDP condena "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle"
articles.content:
CNCDP condena "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle"
						
Pyongyang, 2 de marzo (ATCC) -- EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas deben parar ahora mismo los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle" para la agresion a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Asi subrayo el portavoz del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz en su declaracion publicada el dia 2 y continuo: 
					
					Los belicistas estadounidenses y surcoreanos exponen abiertamente su intento de derrumbar el regimen de la contraparte (RPDC) hablando de la "eliminacion de armas nucleares y misiles" y la "preparacion para el estado emergente".
					
					En el mismo contexto, libran freneticamente esos ejercicios de guerra movilizando enormes fuerzas armadas y medios de guerra nuclear con que pueden ejecutar una guerra total.
					
					Aunque ellos los describen como "defensivos", esto es una sofisteria para ocultar su genio agresivo, eludir la responsabilidad de haber llevado la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana al umbral de guerra y enganar la opinion publica interna y externa.
					
					Las muy cinicas y ridiculas autoridades surcoreanas hablan tanto que "esta abierta la puerta de dialogo" realizando esa maniobra belica para atropellar con fuerzas armadas a la contraparte y cuestionando la "sinceridad" de alguien.
					
					La situacion de hoy hace recordar los dias en visperas de la pasada guerra coreana (1950-1953) cuando el traidor Syngman Rhee respondio con provocar la guerra de agresion al Norte en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras al patriotico llamamiento del Comite Central del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria, en el cual se habia presentado la propuesta de la RPDC para prevenir la division eterna de la nacion y reunificar la patria de manera pacifica.
					
					EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas no estan interesados desde el principio en el dialogo N-S, ni en la distension ni en la paz y persiguen solo la confrontacion y la guerra contra la RPDC.
					
					Como ya declarado, el ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC castigaran rotunda e implacablemente a los que se atrevan a atentar contra la dignidad nacional y el regimen de ella.

articles.title: ATCC comenta el rumor de la crisis de marzo
articles.content:
ATCC comenta el rumor de la crisis de marzo 
Pyongyang, 2 de marzo (ATCC) -- Ultimamente, corre en el Sur de Corea el rumor de la crisis de marzo de la Peninsula Coreana.
					Las autoridades surcoreanas y las fuerzas conservadoras intransigentes de la capa militar del Sur de Corea arman alborotos en la delantera hablando como si se producirian en marzo el asalto sorpresivo y la provocacion militar de alguien. 
					
					Entonces, ?quien necesita ese rumor que difunden EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas?
					
					En una palabra, ese rumor fue inventado para las fuerzas conservadoras surcoreanas, que tienen miedo por sus actos antinacionales, y para EE.UU. que pretende jugar el papel protagonico en la region de Asia-Pacifico aprovechando la agravacion de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Despues de que se tomaron este ano las medidas y las propuestas de la RPDC para el amplio dialogo, todos los coreanos desearon que ellas resulten el mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas abriendo la era de reconciliacion y paz en el territorio patrio congelado por la confrontacion.
					
					Pero, los titeres surcoreanos llevaron a la ruptura el dialogo previo preparado dificilmente para las conversaciones militares de alto nivel Norte-Sur. Por eso, necesitaban un pretexto para justificar sus actos criminales ante la nacion y el mundo. 
					
					El rumor de la crisis de marzo conviene a la intencion siniestra de EE.UU. y la banda traidora surcoreana de dar el preludio de nuevas tensiones militares en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Frenar la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas difundiendo rumores falsos anti-RPDC y creando la tension es un metodo rutinario de la banda de conservadores surcoreanos.
					
					La historia de relaciones entre el Norte y el Sur esta manchada por incontables complots y provocaciones de los titeres surcoreanos para agravar la confrontacion fratricida y la tension y provocar una nueva guerra, en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras. 
					
					Detras de ellos, esta EE.UU. 
					
					Hace poco, el imperio acordo con los titeres surcoreanos seguir enviando los portaaviones a la Peninsula Coreana bajo el pretexto de prevenir las supuestas provocaciones adicionales. 
					
					El comandante norteamericano en Asia-Pacifico dijo que dentro de unos meses, la RPDC cometera una provocacion adicional y describio los ejercicios belicos "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle" como defensivos para frenar la guerra. Ademas, el director de la Agencia Central de Inteligencia de EE.UU. tambien disparateo que el Norte de Corea intentaria una provocacion adicional. 
					
					Tales hechos demuestran que EE.UU. y la banda de traidores surcoreanos son los que buscan la crisis de marzo. 
					
					Las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de la RPDC observan agudamente como marcha la situacion manteniendose en alerta. 
					
					EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos deben parar ahora mismo los ejercicios de guerra, iguales a meterse en el fuego con gasolina.

articles.title: Exitos logrados en la modernizacion de comunicaciones
articles.content:
Exitos logrados en la modernizacion de comunicaciones
Pyongyang, 2 de marzo (ATCC) -- En el sector de comunicaciones de Corea se acabo la extension de las redes de fibra optica usando las tecnologias sofisticadas y a base de ello, se logro el establecimiento de la autopista de informaciones de nivel avanzado en el ambito mundial. 
					Igualmente, se implantaron en todo el pais la red de comunicaciones celulares de tercera generacion y el sistema de comunicaciones via satelite al estilo coreano.
					
					  La introduccion de fibra optica, la digitalizacion y la automatizacion de las redes renovaron fundamentalmente la infraestructura de comunicaciones del pais.
					
					  La fibra optica necesaria fue producida por la Fabrica de Cables de Comunicaciones de Fibra Optica de Pyongyang.
					
					   Por otra parte, gracias a la digitalizacion, la capacidad de operacion automatica de telefonia se ha ampliado casi 20 veces.
					
					  Las fabricas de maquinas de comunicacion produjeron en masas los equipos y materiales que contribuyeron mucho a la modernizacion de la rama.
					
					  Gracias a tales exitos, se abrieron amplias posibilidades de desarrollar en un corto plazo las comunicaciones de informatica en el pais.
					
					En apenas un semestre, las entidades del sector ampliaron cientos de veces la banda de las transmisiones de informaciones entre la capital y las provincias.
					
					Se establecio en un ano la autopista de informaciones de nivel mundial y asi quedo ampliada miles de veces la capacidad de transmision.
					
					La red de comunicaciones de alta velocidad posibilito asegurar en un alto nivel las comunicaciones por telefonos, el intercambio de datos y la telefonia celular, particularmente, la divulgacion de ciencias y tecnicas, la educacion y el servicio medico a larga distancia y la reunion de video, etc.
					
					La red de telefonia celular 3G permite tambien la transmision de correos electronicos, videos y multimedias.
					
					Gracias al establecimiento de la micro-red de comunicacion satelital, se hizo posible asegurar en cualesquier condiciones la direccion de gestiones de economia nacional.
					
					Todos los equipos de transmision via satelite y las estaciones de retransmision de la TV se adaptaron en un corto tiempo al formato digital posibilitando la digitalizacion de la transmision internacional de TV via satelite.
					
					Los equipos transmisores de TV de alta resolucion permiten retransmitir via satelite las informaciones y la TV internacionales.
					
					Gracias al establecimiento del autoctono sistema de comunicaciones por satelite, se dio la capacidad de garantizar la celebracion exitosa de reuniones y actos internacionales de cualquier dimension.

articles.title: Palestinos rechazan el cinismo de Estados Unidos
articles.content:
Palestinos rechazan el cinismo de Estados Unidos
Pyongyang, 2 de marzo (ATCC) -- Los palestinos estan indignados por la actitud cinica de EE.UU. que ampara la ampliacion de asentamientos judios.
					Como ya trascendidos, el 18 de febrero, Estados Unidos ha sido el unico de los 15 miembros del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU en votar en contra del proyecto de resolucion presentado por los paises arabes para condenar la expansion de asentamientos judios.
					
					Al conocerse esta noticia, la Organizacion de Liberacion Palestina organizo por la noche de ese dia una reunion urgente y condeno fuertemente el cinismo de EE.UU.
					
					Se realizaron en varios puntos de Cisjordania como Ramallah las manifestaciones antiyanquis de los palestinos.
					
					Ellos calificaron el ejercicio de veto por EE.UU. como acto hostil a los palestinos.
					
					Demandando la disculpa, comenzaron la campana para romper todas las relaciones con Estados Unidos, inclusive rechazar la ayuda.
					
					En otros paises arabes tambien se alzan las voces de protesta.
					
					La Camara de Diputados de la Asamblea General de Jordania senalo en su nota que el veto de EE.UU. demostro fehacientemente la inconcordancia entre su posicion superficial en cuanto al problema del Medio Oriente y sus acciones.
					
					Condeno que el imperio frustro asi todos los esfuerzos internacionales por la paz regional.
					
					Segun las estadisticas no oficiales reportadas por las fuentes extranjeras, EE.UU. ejercio el veto en la ONU 83 veces hasta el presente caso para apoyar absolutamente a Israel que viola los derechos legitimos de Palestina.
					
					En septiembre del ano pasado, Israel reanudo las conversaciones de paz con Palestina, pero este dialogo fue abortado poco despues debido a la expansion de asentamientos judios.
					
					Los paises arabes presentaron en diciembre al Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU un proyecto de resolucion que condena la expansion de asentamientos de Israel y sus actos contra el proceso pacificador.
					
					Cuando Palestina rehuso el mandato de EE.UU. de que haga concesiones, este imperio ejercio finalmente el veto durante la votacion.
					
					En una entrevista de prensa, un funcionario palestino preciso que el mundo asiente la ilegalidad de la ampliacion de asentamientos de Israel y continuo que Estados Unidos seria el unico pais en contra del proyecto de resolucion entre los 192 paises miembros de la ONU.
					
					El apoyo de EE.UU. al expansionismo territorial de Israel deviene desafio a la unanime aspiracion de la sociedad internacional que desea la solucion imparcial del problema palestino.
					
					La politica dominacionista de EE.UU. sobre el Medio Oriente y su amparo a Israel basado en ella lo pondran en una situacion mas critica en la zona.
